name: flask-backend
description: Make sure you have python3 and virtualenv installed  step 1  ``` git clone https://github.com/guptaautkarsh/flask-backend.git ``` step 2 ``` cd flask-backend ``` step 3 ``` python3 -m venv venv ``` step 4 ``` source venv/bin/activate ``` step 5 ``` pip install -r requirements.txt ``` step 6 ``` python3 run.py ``` """
